info.title: LiveChat
info.description: LiveChat is an online customer service software with live support, help desk software and web analytics capabilities.

post.description: This operation triggers when a new ticket is added.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, create a ticket.

post.description: This operation triggers when new a chat starts.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, start a chat.

post.description: This operation triggers when a chat ends.
post.x-ms-trigger-hint: To see it work now, end a chat.

get.description: This operation returns a list of all the agents in your LiveChat account.

post.description: This operation is used to add a new agent to your LiveChat account.

delete.description: This operation is used to delete an agent from your LiveChat account.

get.description: This operation returns a list of tickets in your LiveChat account.

post.description: This operation is used to add a new ticket to your LiveChat account.

put.description: This operation is used to update the details of an existing ticket in your LiveChat account.

get.description: This operation is used to fetch the details of a specific ticket in your LiveChat account.

x-ms-test-value.subject: I have a problem
x-ms-test-value.message: Hi,I have a problem with my shoes. Could you please advise?

x-ms-test-value.message: Hi,I have a problem with my shoes. Could you please advise?

agent_id.description: Unique id of the agent associated with the message.

user_type.description: Type of the user sending the message.

url.description: Url of the website where chat started.

event_unique_id.description: Unique id of the event associated with the chat.

pre_chat_survey.description: Array of pre chat survey responses.

language.description: Language associated with the visitor's account.

page_current.description: Webpage that the chat originated from.

url.description: Url of the website that the ticket was sent from.

type.description: Type of event that generated the ticket.
Lc2, mail, facebook, agent-app-manual or chat-window.

url.description: Url of the website where ticket was created.
Webpage where the ticket was created.
Url of the website that the ticket was sent from.

type.description: Type of event that generated the ticket.
Lc2, mail, facebook, agent-app-manual or chat-window.

url.description: Url of the website where ticket was created.

ListAgents_Response.description: List of all agents with their details.

avatar.description: Path to the image on Amazon s3.
Path to the image on Amazon s3.

groups.description: List of all groups the agent is a part of.

login_status.description: Accepting chats or not accepting chats.

status.description: Accepting chats, not accepting chats or offline.
